title: A review of pathogen removal from municipal wastewater using advanced oxidation processes: Agricultural application, regrowth risks, and new perspectives
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Barnabas Oluoch, Takudzwa Mandizvo, William Musazura, Taruvinga Badza, Benton Otieno, Stephen Ojwach, Alfred Odindo
